Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos hit a walk-off single in the bottom of the 9th inning to tie the game for the Phillies
Mark Vientos hit a game-tying home run in the top of the 9th inning for the Mets
Bryson Stott hit a two-run triple in the 8th inning for the Phillies
Pete Alonso hit a solo home run in the 6th inning for the Mets
Luis Severino allowed back-to-back home runs to Bryce Harper and Nick Castellanos in the 6th inning, tying the game at 3-3
Pre-Game Insights: No pre-game insights were mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Brandon Nimmo expressed pride in the Mets' efforts despite the loss
Mark Vientos was excited to return to Citi Field for Game 3
Miscellaneous Highlights: Edwin Diaz struggled in the 8th inning, giving up the go-ahead runs for the Phillies
Cristopher Sanchez pitched five innings and allowed two earned runs for the Phillies
Luis Severino pitched six innings and allowed three earned runs for the Mets
Others: No other significant mentions were made in the article
